messages.content: Guide me through a short meditation to help me feel calm, present, and grounded.
你好，请问有什么可以帮助你的？
解释一下什么是人工智能？
请详细分析一下当前AI发展的趋势和未来方向...
Can you help me with a breathing exercise?
I'm feeling stressed, can you guide me through a relaxation technique?
Lead me through a 5-minute mindfulness meditation
